title: Negotiating competency, professionalism and risk: The integr
author: Cant; Sarah; Watts; Peter; Ruston; Annmarie
description: This qualitative interview study examined the use of complementary and alternative medicine (CAM) by nurses and midwives in NHS hospital settings in 2008 in the UK. It showed that the groundswell of i
